description: Mistress Carly returns home from a night on the town with a guy she's only just met. Her cuckolded husband is made to watch as she seduces her new man and uses him for her sexual pleasure. Her husband is ordered to worship her boots, is spat at and humiliated the entire time. That's as close as he'll ever get to sex with his wife from now on.
title: Carly's Cuckold
